messages.content: Islington Labour is on your side

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building more affordable housing including over 50,000 council homes and improving safety standards.
Protect new workers by bringing in a £10 per hour living wage.
Bringing back free school meals and college grants, providing free education for all ages.
Ending NHS privatisation and providing secure funding.
Bringing railways back into public ownership.

mentions.candidate: Vote Labour on 8th June to re-elect me as your MP and to elect a Labour Government.

issues.brexitEurope: Protecting the rights of EU citizens living in the UK and protecting the Workers’ Rights.
issues.economy: Bringing in a £10 per hour living wage.
